sub_title: Global Head of Strategy & Business Segments, Service Providers
summary:
I am an experienced business professional with 15+ years of expertise in business strategy, business development and go to market programs in Financial services, Software and Information technology domain. Throughout my career delivered consistent high performing standards by putting customer relationship and needs first. Started my career in the European domain, worked and lived in multiple countries and gradually expanded to my current global responsibilities. 

Specialties: Business strategy and business development, strong negotiation & presentation skills, ambitious and result driven. Solution Sales, Consultative Selling. Maintaining high standards of individual and team performance. Multi-lingual.

Strong market expertise in Financial services, Software and Information Technology.
